title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.20 - Reports to commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.20 - Reports to commission

State Regulations

No later than March 15 of each year, the account wagering
licensee shall file with the commission a report detailing the following for
the previous calendar year in which account wagering was offered: (a) total handle bet through the account
wagering system; (b) total handle
segregated by telephone, internet and other means; (c) total handle segregated by
track; (d) the beginning number of
accounts, total accounts opened and closed and the ending number of accounts; and
(e) any other report as may be
prescribed by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.20

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
